required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 06, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Social Media Effect on Knowledge Dissemination During COVID-19 Virus Outbreak
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Social Media on Knowledge Dissemination Between Physicians During COVID-19 Virus Outbreak

brief_summary.textblock:
The recent COVID-19 outbreak is very challenging as data are distributed instantly on the
      data are very rapidly distributed through professional and non professional sources which may
      impact the management of the disease

detailed_description.textblock:
We are conducting a survey between the physicians to study the effect and practice of
      received knowledge disseminated through social media .

      the survey will be distributed through internet and data will be collected and analyzed

primary_outcome.measure: Number of physicians affected by social media measured by online survey designed to measure the influence of social media on medical practice
primary_outcome.description: the survey will be send and received online and data will be analysed

study_pop.textblock: the study survey will be distributed through email to medical physicians in our territory

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Medical Physicians in Middle East area

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  none
